Name: ENIAC coding system
Chief developer, company: John von Neumann, John Mauchly, J. Presper Eckert, Herman Goldstine after Alan Turing. The first programmers of ENIAC were Kay McNulty, Betty Jennings, Betty Snyder, Marlyn Meltzer, Fran Bilas, and Ruth Lichterman.
